text: The Russian Question () is a 1948 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikhail Romm.«Потому что он живой! И светится...» Смех и боль Виктора Драгунского It stars Vsevolod Aksyonov, Yelena Kuzmina, and Mikhail Astangov. == Actors == * Vsevolod Aksyonov — Harry Smith * Yelena Kuzmina — Jessie West * Mikhail Astangov — McPherson * Mikhail Nazvanov — Jack Gould *Boris Tenin — Bob Murphy * Mariya Barabanova — Meg == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet drama movies Category:1948 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies set in the 1940s Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the United States Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Romm Category:Movies about journalism
title: The Russian Question
